title: Help! SAKS FIFTH AVENUE
content:
Hi --

I'm new to the board (having been a member for all of 2 minutes and 37 seconds at this point in time), and I am trying to find out the name of the font/typeface used in the SAKS FIFTH AVENUE logo. Any ideas?

Thanks for your help.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [SAKS LOGO\_K-O.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20141111221656/http:/typophile.com/files/SAKS%20LOGO_K-O.JPG) | 28.15 KB |
author: CariDLC

comments.content: YOU ROCK! I actually HAVE that typeface! Thank you :-)
It's great when it works out like that, isn't it? :)
I thought I'd be waiting HOURS for the answer. Thanks again. I'll try to pass it forward!
